add_library_unity(duckdb_common_enums
                  OBJECT
                  expression_type.cpp
                  join_type.cpp
                  logical_operator_type.cpp
                  physical_operator_type.cpp
                  statement_type.cpp)
set(ALL_OBJECT_FILES
    ${ALL_OBJECT_FILES} $<TARGET_OBJECTS:duckdb_common_enums>
    PARENT_SCOPE)
